data.lyric:
[ti:Fire (Explicit)]
[ar:KIDS SEE GHOSTS]
[al:KIDS SEE GHOSTS (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.52]Fire (Explicit) - KIDS SEE GHOSTS
[00:01.43]Producer：Kanye West/Boogz/Andre 3000/Kid Cudi
[00:02.84]Kanye West：
[00:04.14]I love all your sh*t talkin'
[00:08.72]I love all your sh*t talkin'
[00:12.40]You ain't got nothin' better to do with yourself
[00:15.34]I done proved to myself
[00:16.79]Back on that rulin' myself
[00:17.96]I got new news to tell
[00:19.60]Act like you knew you done failed
[00:21.34]Only true know how I feel and only if you knew how I felt
[00:24.64]Sniffed a lil' bootch off the nail
[00:26.35]Through with mixed messages
[00:27.39]Through with the mail
[00:28.61]Only a few in the field
[00:30.39]Little bit off for the real
[00:32.12]Kid Cudi：
[00:51.17]It's so many days I prayed to God
[00:52.65]All this pain
[00:53.27]I couldn't seem to find a way
[00:55.34]On a mission livin' carry on
[00:57.51]Got my family
[00:58.10]I'm seein' through by the days
[00:59.94]Never late
[01:01.31]Pull up a seat and come grab a plate
[01:03.64]Check the date
[01:04.53]Let 'em hate
[01:05.89]This the type sh*t that they couldn't make
[01:07.99]Watch the fakes
[01:09.37]Leave 'em buzzin'
[01:09.98]Thought they wasn't huh
[01:11.53]Tell all your kinfolk and cousins huh
[01:13.79]This is the package you ordered huh
[01:16.15]Beautiful madness
[01:17.15]Kid Cudi：
[01:17.48]On this road I find hmm mmm
[01:21.81]These scars I left behind hmm mmm
[01:26.49]Heaven lift me up hmm mmm
[01:31.10]Heaven lift me up hmm mmm
[01:35.38]On this road I find hmm mmm
[01:39.99]These scars I left behind hmm mmm
[01:44.61]Heaven lift me up hmm mmm
[01:49.30]Heaven lift me up hmm mmm
data.trans:
[ti:Fire (Explicit)]
[ar:KIDS SEE GHOSTS]
[al:KIDS SEE GHOSTS (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.52]//
[00:01.43]//
[00:02.84]//
[00:04.14]我喜欢你说的那些屁话
[00:08.72]我喜欢你说的那些屁话
[00:12.40]你真的拿自己没办法了
[00:15.34]我已经证明了自己
[00:16.79]我又可以做自己的主宰了
[00:17.96]我有消息要告诉你
[00:19.60]你好像知道自己已经输了
[00:21.34]知道我的感受才是真的 你只有了解我的感受才行
[00:24.64]抽一口** 感觉有个女人一样快活
[00:26.35]乱七八糟的短信
[00:27.39]还有邮件
[00:28.61]战场上只剩寥寥几个敌人
[00:30.39]感觉有点不真实
[00:32.12]//
[00:51.17]多少日子 我向天祈祷
[00:52.65]这些痛苦
[00:53.27]似乎我找不到出口
[00:55.34]继续活着 不过是完成任务
[00:57.51]我想到了家人
[00:58.10]我又渐渐看开了
[00:59.94]永远不会晚
[01:01.31]拉出椅子 来拿个盘子
[01:03.64]看看日期
[01:04.53]让他们恨吧
[01:05.89]我们做出的东西 他们根本就做不出来
[01:07.99]看看那些骗子
[01:09.37]随他们哔哔吧
[01:09.98]他们还以为自己没说假话
[01:11.53]告诉你的亲朋好友
[01:13.79]这就是你的定的包裹
[01:16.15]美丽的疯狂
[01:17.15]//
[01:17.48]在这条路上 我发现了
[01:21.81]我甩在身后的伤疤
[01:26.49]天堂带我升空
[01:31.10]天堂带我升空
[01:35.38]在这条路上 我发现了
[01:39.99]我甩在身后的伤疤
[01:44.61]天堂带我升空
[01:49.30]天堂带我升空
